paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Interestingly, only one BRCA2 mutation was found in 3 patients, the c.9371A>T (p.Asn3124Ile) missense variant, a founder defect in the eastern European population.

functional_data.summary: The c.9371A>T variant is noted as a founder defect in the eastern European population.

variants.additional_notes: This variant was mentioned as recurrent in the context of the Romanian population.
key_quotes: Interestingly, only one BRCA2 mutation was found in 3 patients, the c.9371A>T (p.Asn3124Ile) missense variant, a founder defect in the eastern European population.
